RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢 How it started
How it's going 🙏🌱
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): From its inception, Developer DAO sought to be a space rooted in people who want to educate, and who want to build. After months of hard work, our new governance token $CODE has officially launched today 🥳 blog post: thread 👇 🧵 #CODEdrop https://devdao.mirror.xyz/lGRLUA7wXZP2Rs5TxPRDks7Ho4yjSRUFLGNRfxeAz80

entry.summary: RT nagma 🥐 Can't believe this day is here! It's been wild seeing Developer DAO explode to what it has become today. Eternally grateful that I was able to spend that time in the beginning, learn and end up with my current gig because of it🫶 hope to someday contribute again! entry.title: RT willblackburn.eth: This thread is why @developer_dao is so awesome. Many of the members, including Manny, have been here from the start, put in ton...
entry.summary: RT willblackburn.eth This thread is why @developer_dao is so awesome. Many of the members, including Manny, have been here from the start, put in tons of hours, only to give away memberships! Manny (🧱,🚀) 📍🇨🇦Vancouver 🔜 🇹🇷 🔜 🇩🇪: With the announcement of $CODE I’m offering a single membership of 400 tokens to someone you’d like to nominate to join @developer_dao by the end of the week. Reply to this thread with nominations.

entry.title: RT pbillingsby: The time is now. I’m looking for 2 people who are deserving of becoming governing members of @developer_dao. If I can’t decide on 2 ...
entry.summary: RT pbillingsby The time is now. I’m looking for 2 people who are deserving of becoming governing members of @developer_dao. If I can’t decide on 2 I’ll throw a wild card in there! pbillingsby: With my first web3 paycheck I will buy and give a @developer_dao NFT to a deserving community member. With my second paycheck I’ll do the same

entry.summary: RT pbillingsby For the last 10 months @developer_dao has been my home, my school and my favorite hangout. It’s changed my life, career and given me countless new friends and opportunities. Today is a proud and happy day! Everyone involved should be insanely proud. D_D FOREVER!!!
